name: SwitchBot
description:
Guide SwitchBot through the levels, pressing switches to change the background color (and reveal hidden platforms), collect all of the metal nuts to go to the next level. 

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys = Move / Activate Switches

Spacebar = Jump

1-5 = Change Palette (1: Default [BGB], 2: Alt, 3: Super GameBoy, 4: BizHawk, 5: Grayscale)

Alt + 1-4 = Change Resolution

Most graphics + Concept Art was done by Nat (@sonicfursuits)

Music was made by Niko (@NikoPerkin)

And the cute title screen was drawn by Josh (@pokeypokeypanic)
